name: Cussmuss: the ice cone fuss
description:
One mussy Moose craves for an ice cone from one cussy Goose.

Now ever they chase for each other.

____

You’re a spectator of their story, armed with but a left mouse-click.

Get that ice cone before it hits the ground!

Delay Moose, help Goose.

Don’t melt - have fun!

____

Extras:

  • We’re a team of artists (original Art, Music, Narrative), yet we tried to code. Sharp, for real.
  • Level design (despite the sprites) from real photos of the early snowy spring in the northern countryside.
  • Next time we’ll have some animation skills, be wary.
